mapper.select: SELECT S.MT20ID, S.DAY_OF_WEEK AS dayOfWeek, S.PERFORMANCE_TIME AS performanceTime, S.SEAT_COUNT AS totalSeatCount, S.AVAILABLE_COUNT AS availableSeatCount, S.GRADE_ID AS gradeId, S.GRADE_NAME AS gradeName, S.PRICE AS gradePrice FROM ( SELECT TPF.MT20ID, TPT.DAY_OF_WEEK, TPT.PERFORMANCE_TIME, TVSI.SEAT_COUNT, TVSI.SEAT_COUNT - COUNT(TTS.SEATS_ID) AS AVAILABLE_COUNT, SG.GRADE_ID, SG.GRADE_NAME, PSP.PRICE FROM TB_PERFORMANCES_DETAIL TPF JOIN TB_PERFORMANCE_TIME TPT ON TPF.MT20ID = TPT.MT20ID JOIN TB_VENUE_SEAT_INFO TVSI ON TPF.MT10ID = TVSI.MT10ID JOIN TB_SEAT_GRADE SG ON SG.GRADE_ID = TVSI.GRADE_ID JOIN TB_PERFORMANCE_SEAT_PRICE PSP ON TPF.MT20ID = PSP.MT20ID AND TVSI.GRADE_ID = PSP.GRADE_ID LEFT JOIN TB_TICKET_SEAT TTS ON TTS.MT20ID = TPF.MT20ID AND TTS.GRADE_ID = TVSI.GRADE_ID AND TTS.SEAT_STATUS = 'BOOKED' AND TTS.SHOW_DATE = TO_DATE(#{selectedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TTS.SHOW_TIME = #{selectedTime} WHERE TPF.MT20ID = #{mt20id} AND TPT.DAY_OF_WEEK = #{dayOfWeek} GROUP BY TPF.MT20ID, TPT.DAY_OF_WEEK, TPT.PERFORMANCE_TIME, TVSI.SEAT_COUNT, SG.GRADE_ID, SG.GRADE_NAME, PSP.PRICE ) S ORDER BY S.GRADE_ID

SELECT PD.MT20ID AS mt20id, PD.MT10ID AS mt10id, PD.PRFNM AS prfnm, PD.PRFPDFROM AS prfpdfrom, PD.PRFPDTO AS prfpdto, PD.FCLTYNM AS fcltynm, PD.PRFRUNTIME AS prfruntime, PD.POSTER AS poster FROM "TB_PERFORMANCES_DETAIL" PD WHERE PD.MT20ID = #{performanceId}
